Sequence Information.Peptide Name: L5A (Synthetic AMPs, PG-1 analog, Arg-rich, 2S=S, UCSS1a)
Sequence Information.Source: amino acid SUBSTITUTION, pig cathelicidin analog, animal-derived, natural derivatives

Literature.Author: Bolosov IA, Panteleev PV, Sychev SV, Khokhlova VA, Safronova VN, Toropygin IY, Kombarova TI, Korobova OV, Pereskokova ES, Borzilov AI, Ovchinnikova TV, Balandin SV.2023
Literature.Title: Design of Protegrin-1 Analogs with Improved Antibacterial Selectivity.

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (94.44%) toProtegrin 1R: 33%, C: 22%, G: 17%.Activity: active against E. coli ATCC 25922 or ML35p or BW 25113 (MIC 0.125-0.5 uM), P. aeruginosa PAO1 or ATCC 27853 (MIC 0.25-0.5 uM), A. baumannii (MIC 0.25 uM), K. pneumoniae ATCC 700603 (MIC 1 uM), S. aureus 209P or ATCC 29213 (MIC 1 uM), and M. luteus B-1314 (MIC 0.5 uM).In vitro toxicity: 40.3% hemolysis at 64 uM, less than WT PG-1.Recombinant production:bacteria:Escherichia coli: recombinant peptide was obtained and used.
